Hotel.name: Holiday Inn Express Beijing Airport Zone

Address.Address1: No 1 Building No 6 Court Jingshun E Rd

Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Holiday Inn Express Beijing Airport Zone in Beijing, you'll be near the airport and within the vicinity of 798 Space and China International Exhibition Center. This hotel is within the region of Lady Street and Forbidden City.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 191 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Your bed comes with down comforters, and all rooms are furnished with single sofa beds. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Holiday Inn Express Beijing Airport Zone. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in Beijing? This hotel has 70 square feet (6 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and a meeting room.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Holiday Inn Express Beijing Airport Zone. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Express Beijing Airport Zone is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
